Footer.disclaimer: PaySense is a financial technology company, not a bank. Banking services are provided by our licensed partner banks. USD deposits are FDIC insured up to $250,000 through our partner banks.

RootLayout.title: Paysense
RootLayout.description: Your No. 1 Banking and Financial App

intro.title: 1. Introduction
intro.p1: This document governs the use of the PaySense app, website, and all associated services. By creating an account, you explicitly agree to be bound by these terms.
intro.p2: These terms apply to all users globally, regardless of their country of residence, subject to local regulatory requirements.

wallets.title: 5. Wallets & Currencies
wallets.p1: PaySense allows users to hold separate USD and EUR wallets. These balances are distinct and are shown per currency.
list: Wallets do not perform automatic conversions.
Conversion only occurs when you explicitly approve the transaction.
Balances are held securely with our regulated partner banks.

fx.title: 7. FX Conversion
fx.p1: Transparency is our core principle. Exchange rates and all applicable fees are shown in the app before you confirm any conversion.
fx.warning: Once confirmed, FX conversions are final and cannot be reversed.
fx.p2: The app does not perform "silent" or hidden conversions. The rate you see is the rate you get.

loans.title: 9. Loans
loans.p1: Loans are strictly currency-specific (USD or EUR). To protect users from market volatility, repayments must be made in the same currency as the loan principal.
loans.p2: FX conversion is not permitted for the purpose of loan repayment to ensure zero FX risk for the borrower.

compliance.title: 11. Compliance & KYC
compliance.p1: To prevent fraud and comply with international AML (Anti-Money Laundering) regulations, all users are required to undergo identity verification (KYC).
compliance.p2: Failure to provide accurate documentation may result in account restrictions or termination.

footer.questions: Questions about these terms? Contact us at

ResetPassword.title: New Password
ResetPassword.description: Please choose a strong password you haven't used before.

errors.invalidToken: Invalid or missing reset token. Please request a new link.
errors.passwordLength: Password must be at least 8 characters long

metadata.title: Create an Account | Start your free trading journal today
metadata.description: Join thousands of traders building consistency and discipline. Create a free account to start logging trades, managing risk and improving your trading performance.

PrivacyPage.title: Privacy Policy
PrivacyPage.subtitle: At PaySense, your privacy is a priority. Learn how we collect, use, and protect your personal and financial data.

personal.label: A. Personal Information
personal.desc: Full name, email address, phone number, date of birth, and country of residence.

financial.label: B. Financial Information
financial.desc: Wallet balances, transaction history, FX conversions, and loan records.

technical.label: C. Technical Data
technical.desc: Device information, IP address, and login activity (time, location, device type).

use.title: 2. How We Use Your Information
list: To provide and manage your USD & EUR banking services.
To process transactions and FX conversions securely.
To comply with international financial regulations and AML laws.
To prevent fraud and unauthorized access to your account.
To send you important service updates and security alerts.

sharing.title: 3. Data Sharing
sharing.p1: We share your data with regulated financial partners, payment networks (Visa/Mastercard), and fraud-prevention providers.
sharing.highlight: We never sell your data to advertisers.

security.title: 4. Security Measures
security.p1: PaySense uses bank-grade encryption (AES-256) for data at rest and TLS for data in transit. We maintain strict access controls and monitor our systems 24/7 for unauthorized activity.

rights.title: Your Rights
rights.description: Under international data protection laws, you have the right to access, correct, or request the deletion of your data. Financial records must be retained for a minimum period as required by law.

hero.headline: International banking
hero.description: Open USD and EUR accounts from Nigeria in minutes. Receive global payments, spend anywhere with virtual cards, and move money at the real exchange rate.

wallets.title: USD & EUR Wallets
wallets.description: Get your own dedicated US Routing and European IBAN. Receive money from clients or employers as if you lived there.

cards.title: Virtual Cards
cards.description: Instant USD cards for Netflix, Amazon, and international ads. 3D Secure enabled.

fx.title: Real FX Conversion
fx.description: Swap currencies at the mid-market rate with zero hidden markups.

loans.title: Instant Loans
loans.description: Coming Soon: Access credit lines based on your history.

security.title: Protected Funds
security.description: Your money is held in segregated accounts with Tier-1 banks.

steps.title: Sign up
steps.desc: Create your account with just your phone number.

steps.title: Verify identity
steps.desc: Quick biometric and BVN check for instant approval.

steps.title: Start transacting
steps.desc: Fund your wallet and move money across borders.

compliance.title: Regulated. Protected. Safe.
compliance.description: We are a technology platform, not a bank. Banking services are provided by our licensed infrastructure partners.

currencies.question: What currencies are supported?
currencies.answer: Currently, we support USD and EUR. Each is managed in a separate wallet to ensure total transparency and no accidental conversions.

automatic.question: Are conversions automatic?
automatic.answer: No. To uphold our 'No Silent FX' promise, all currency conversions must be manually reviewed and confirmed by you.

cardLinking.question: Are cards linked to a specific currency?
cardLinking.answer: Yes. Each virtual card is tied specifically to either your USD or EUR wallet. This prevents unexpected exchange rate fluctuations during transactions.

kyc.question: Why do I need to verify my identity?
kyc.answer: Identity verification (KYC) is a regulatory requirement that keeps your funds safe and allows us to provide international banking rails.

ForgotPasswordPage.title: Reset Password
ForgotPasswordPage.description: Enter your email and we'll send you a link to get back into your account.

hero.title: Compliance and regulatory responsibility
hero.description: We operate with a strong commitment to regulatory compliance, financial security, and responsible banking practices.

framework.intro: We operate in accordance with applicable financial regulations and industry standards in the regions where our services are offered. This includes compliance with requirements related to:

kyc.title: Individual (KYC)
kyc.description: To use our services, individuals are required to verify their identity. This may include:

kyb.title: Business (KYB)
kyb.description: Businesses must complete verification before activation, which may include:

monitoring.title: AML & Monitoring
monitoring.description: We maintain systems designed to detect, prevent, and report suspicious activity, including ongoing transaction monitoring and risk-based reviews.

data.title: Data Protection
data.description: We protect personal and business data using industry-standard security measures, including encryption and access controls. We process data in line with applicable data protection regulations.

risk.title: Risk Disclosure
risk.description: Financial services involve risk, including exchange rate fluctuations and transaction delays. Users are responsible for reviewing transaction details before confirmation.

hero.title: Build the future of
hero.subtitle: Join a team focused on transparency, security, and building financial products that work across borders.

meaningful.title: Meaningful Work
meaningful.desc: Build products that help individuals and businesses manage money internationally.

standards.title: High Standards
standards.desc: We value clear thinking, responsibility, and quality execution in everything we do.

growth.title: Growth-Oriented
growth.desc: Opportunities to learn, take ownership, and grow alongside the company.

flexible.title: Flexible Work
flexible.desc: Remote or hybrid work options, designed for the modern global workforce.

openPositions.title: Open Positions
openPositions.quote: We're growing and regularly open roles across engineering, product, compliance, and operations.

inclusion.text: We are committed to building an inclusive workplace and encourage applications from people of diverse backgrounds and experiences.

hero.title: Building simple, transparent
hero.subtitle: We provide individuals and businesses with secure access to USD and EUR accounts, international payments, and transparent currency exchange.

mission.title: Who we are
mission.description: We are a financial technology company focused on making international banking clear, predictable, and accessible. Our platform is designed to remove hidden fees, unclear conversions, and unnecessary complexity from cross-border finance.
mission.label: Our Mission
mission.quote: To give individuals and businesses full control over their money across borders, with transparency, security, and compliance at the core.

transparency.title: Transparency
transparency.desc: Every rate, fee, and conversion is visible before confirmation.

security.title: Security
security.desc: Customer funds and data are protected with bank-grade safeguards.

compliance.title: Compliance
compliance.desc: We operate within applicable financial regulations and standards.

clarity.title: Clarity
clarity.desc: Our product is designed to be understood, not decoded.

regulatory.title: Regulatory Commitment
regulatory.description: We operate in alignment with applicable financial regulations and maintain strict standards for identity verification, transaction monitoring, and data protection. We partner with licensed financial institutions to provide banking infrastructure.
